name: DigitalMarketingMomentToday
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: You want to build a great business? You have a message you are passionate about that the world just NEEDS to hear? Join us with each episode where we share practical tactics and strategies to build your brand online and get your message out to the world. Valerie Morris is a digital and social media strategist with trusted experience and proven results for clients and for her own brand. She shares things she has learned over the years related to digital marketing and how to apply those to new technologies and trends that are constantly emerging. If you want to get your brand out to the world online, these are the tools to help you get there!
